text:
The ‘maha kumbabhishekam’ of Sri Tirumoolanathaswamy temple at Poovalur near Lalgudi will be held on March 18.

A press note from the temple said that ‘maha kumbabhishekam’ will be performed between 9 a.m. and 10.30 a.m. to all the deities – Sri Kunkumasundari the Consort of Lod Siva, Sri Ganapathy, Sri Subramanya and other vimanams.
title: Kumbabhishekam at Poovalur
